name: Match Box Puzzle
description:
Wonder a simple and neat puzzle that exercises your brain? Here is a simple yet neat puzzle that helps you to glued to your mobile to kill your time.

The puzzle is super simple, you will have to move puzzle pieces to board to form a square. But it is not easy one to crack though. As you move different pieces, you will arrive different combinations to form or match a box.

The game has around 200 puzzles to solve. Go ahead and download the game and let me know what you feel of it.
